meanings.definition: To use tear gas to disperse a crowd.
meanings.sent1: The police were teargassing the protesters to maintain order.
meanings.sent2: The authorities resorted to teargassing the unruly crowd.
meanings.sent3: The idea of teargassing a group of people for safety seems paradoxical.
meanings.sent4: In the chaos, teargassing the area felt like a desperate measure.
meanings.sent5: The loud bang followed by teargassing left a lasting impact on the crowd.

meanings.definition: The act of dispersing a crowd using tear gas.
meanings.sent1: The teargassing of the protesters caused a commotion.
meanings.sent2: Witnessing the teargassing was a frightening experience.
meanings.sent3: The news report humorously described the teargassing incident.
meanings.sent4: The teargassing at the rally painted a vivid picture of unrest.
meanings.sent5: The lingering smell of teargassing lingered in the air long after the crowd dispersed.
